name: Soul Shadows
description:
Zombies, got to love what you see, right?  What if you can't see them though?
You better start praying for a lightning storm. 

Destroy the hordes approaching the village.  You can only kill them when you can see them but will they kill you first? 

Use left and right arrow keys to control the lone police officer and spacebar to fire his only weapon, a service revolver. Good luck, you'll need it. 

Find a devlog for this game at https://luxjam2020.blogspot.com/2020/03/game-jam-blog-well-its-been-while-since.html
